name: laravel-vue-route-generator
description: A package to generate and manage routes for Vue applications from Laravel routes.

scripts.setup: mkdir -p resources/js/services && cp examples/services/routeService.js resources/js/services/routeService.js && mkdir -p app/Console/Commands && cp src/Laravel/Console/Commands/GenerateRoutesFile.php app/Console/Commands/GenerateRoutesFile.php

author: Marius Kirkliauskas <marius@kirkliauskas.com>
